alert.note: Alert for Juniata; Snyder; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MIFFLIN...EAST CENTRAL CENTRE...NORTHEASTERN JUNIATA...WESTERN SNYDER AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Lock Haven, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Middleburg, Mcalisterville, McClure, Millheim, Beaver Springs, Aaronsburg, Rebersburg, Paxtonville, Coburn, Troxelville, Weikert, Snyder-Middleswart State Park and Beavertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.
